product_name: Fizik Arione Versus X K:ium Saddle - Men's
long_description: Designed for cyclists who can touch their toes, the lightly padded 225g Fizik Arione Versus X K:ium Saddle offers podium-level performance and full-length, central-channel relief to sensitive tissues.
